title: Was Isaiah Jackson Arrested After Pic Showed Man Kneeling on Toddler?
subtitle: The photograph, whose caption made reference to the Black Lives Matter movement, prompted an outraged response in July 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Isaiah Anthony Wayne Jackson of Springfield, Ohio, was arrested in connection with a widely shared photograph of a man kneeling on a toddler's neck along with the caption "BLM now mf."
